title: Suspect dealt drugs near child, police say
title_page: Suspect dealt drugs near child, police say
maintext:
A suspected drug dealer was arrested Friday after police said they found evidence in a child’s bedroom and near a bib, according to a news release.
Adrian Eguia faces multiple felony counts, including dealing heroin, marijuana and neglect of a dependent. Officers obtained a search warrant and arrived at 1901 Drexel Ave. at 2:45 p.m.
The news release said officers discovered 155.2 grams of marijuana with more than half of the drug being on the floor of a child’s bedroom. Police also said 41.1 grams of heroin, a 40 mm semi-automatic handgun, .38-caliber revolver, a digital scale and several partially smoked marijuana cigarettes were at the residence.
The case remains under investigation.
